title: Bug splat and Repairing Client?
body: This just literally started today  loading into a game and it s bug splats then i gotta sit for 5+ mins for it to repair ,  go to load back into a game and it start all over again.  anyone know what this is? and how to fix it ?  its freakin annoying and  im not tryin  to  get  ban ques  over something i cant help

replies.body:
First up I would try checking off the steps listed in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Then test it out in a custom or practice match first, I don't want you getting unneeded penalties! 

If that's not helping at all, grab that HRT again and make sure that you're running it with the specific options **reinstall and clean uninstall**. Do this with admin permissions on the HRT and do so with an ethernet connection if at all possible to make sure your connection is stable while installing the game files.

First time I had the repair requirement, I had just unlocked an Epic Skin and played my first game with it. As soon as the load out finished, SPLAT!

The only other thing I could have thought of at the time was I had the Game Maker Studio 2 installer just finished. 

But I think it was the new skin.
